Title: Find Collaborators
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: As a music collaborator, I want to easily find and connect with other musicians and influencers on the platform so that I can collaborate and create unique content.
Unnamed: 3: Enables the user to expand their network, find like-minded individuals, and create meaningful collaborations.
Unnamed: 4: The platform should have a search and filter functionality to find musicians and influencers based on genre, location, and availability.The platform should display detailed profiles of musicians and influencers, including their skills, experience, and samples of their work.The platform should have a messaging feature to facilitate communication and collaboration between users.

Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Users can search and filter musicians and influencers based on genre, location, and availability.
Unnamed: 5: List of musicians and influencers matching the search and filter criteria.

Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should display detailed profiles of musicians and influencers, including their skills, experience, and samples of their work.
Unnamed: 5: Detailed profiles of musicians and influencers.

Title: Output Requirements: Messaging Feature

Title: Input Requirements: User Registration
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Users should be able to register and create unique profiles where they can manage their preferences, order history, and reviews.

Title: Output Requirements: Collaborator Profiles
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should display profiles of collaborators, including their preferences, order history, and reviews.

Title: Input Requirements: Collaboration Request
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Users should be able to send collaboration requests to other musicians and influencers.

Title: Output Requirements: Collaboration Requests
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should display collaboration requests received by musicians and influencers.

Title: Input Requirements: Accept/Reject Collaboration Request
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Users should be able to accept or reject collaboration requests received from other musicians and influencers.

Title: Output Requirements: Accepted Collaborations
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should display accepted collaborations between musicians and influencers.

Title: Input Requirements: Messaging
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Users should be able to send and receive messages for communication and collaboration.

Title: Output Requirements: Message History
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should display message history between users for reference and collaboration.

Title: Input Requirements: Content Sharing
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Users should be able to share content, such as music tracks and videos, with other musicians and influencers.

Title: Title
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Description

Title: High Availability for Collaboration Feature
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The collaboration feature should have a high availability rate of at least 99.9% to ensure that musicians and influencers can consistently connect and collaborate without disruptions.

Title: Data Integrity for User Profiles
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The system should ensure the integrity of user profiles, including musician and influencer profiles, to maintain accurate and reliable information for record labels and brands when searching for potential collaborators.

Title: Secure Connection for Collaboration
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should utilize secure connections (e.g., HTTPS) for all interactions related to collaboration, ensuring the confidentiality and integrity of sensitive information exchanged between users.

Title: Backup and Recovery of Collaboration Data
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Regular backups of collaboration data, including messages, files, and project details, should be performed to minimize the risk of data loss. The system should also have a reliable recovery process in place to restore data in case of any disruptions or failures.

Title: Scalability for Growing User Base
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should be able to handle a growing user base of musicians, influencers, record labels, and brands without significant degradation in performance. It should scale horizontally or vertically to accommodate increased user activity and ensure a smooth user experience.

Title: Integration with Social Media APIs
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should integrate with popular social media APIs (such as Instagram, YouTube) to allow users to easily connect and collaborate with musicians and influencers who have a strong presence on these platforms.

Title: Real-time Notifications for Collaboration Requests
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: When a user sends a collaboration request to another user, the platform should provide real-time notifications to both parties, ensuring prompt communication and response.

Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization with Third-Party Platforms
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should securely authenticate and authorize users using their existing accounts on third-party platforms (such as Google, Facebook), ensuring a seamless and trusted login experience.

Title: Integration with Music Streaming Services
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should integrate with popular music streaming services (such as Spotify, Apple Music) to allow users to easily share and showcase their music creations, enhancing collaboration opportunities.

Title: Secure Data Exchange with Record Labels and Brands
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: When record labels and brands view creator profiles and sign them for sponsorship deals, the platform should ensure secure data exchange, protecting sensitive information and maintaining privacy.

Title: Fast Collaborator Search
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: When users search for collaborators, the results should load within 2 seconds to provide a smooth and efficient user experience.

Title: Low Latency Connection Establishment
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should establish connections between users for collaboration within 1 second to minimize waiting time and enable real-time communication.

Title: Efficient Media Upload and Streaming
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Users should be able to upload and stream media files (audio, video) for collaboration without significant delays, with a maximum processing time of 5 seconds per file.

Title: Responsive Profile Loading
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: User profiles, including information and media content, should load within 3 seconds to provide a seamless browsing experience.

Title: Scalable Infrastructure
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should be able to handle increasing user traffic and data volume without significant performance degradation, ensuring a consistent user experience even during peak usage times.

Title: Easy Collaborator Search
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should provide a user-friendly search functionality that allows users to easily find and discover other musicians and influencers based on various criteria such as genre, location, popularity, and collaboration interests.

Title: Clear Collaborator Profiles
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Each collaborator's profile should present clear and comprehensive information about their background, skills, previous collaborations, and social media presence. The profile should be visually appealing and easy to navigate.

Title: Efficient Connection Process
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should facilitate a seamless and efficient connection process between users who want to collaborate. This process should include features such as direct messaging, collaboration request management, and the ability to schedule meetings or virtual sessions.

Title: Collaboration Recommendations
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should provide personalized recommendations for potential collaborators based on users' preferences, past collaborations, and industry trends. These recommendations should help users discover new and relevant opportunities for collaboration.

Title: Responsive and Intuitive Interface
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform's interface should be responsive and optimized for different devices and screen sizes. It should also have an intuitive and user-friendly design, with clear navigation, well-organized content, and easily accessible features.

Title: Secure User Authentication
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should implement strong authentication mechanisms, such as multi-factor authentication, to ensure that only authorized users can access their accounts and prevent unauthorized access.

Title: Data Encryption
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: Sensitive user data, such as personal information and collaboration details, should be encrypted both at rest and in transit to protect against unauthorized access and data breaches.

Title: Access Control
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should have granular access controls to ensure that only authorized users can view and interact with specific content and features. This includes role-based access control and permissions management.

Title: Secure File Sharing
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: When collaborating on content, the platform should provide secure file sharing capabilities to protect intellectual property and prevent unauthorized access or distribution of copyrighted material.

Title: Secure Communication Channels
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should ensure that all communication channels, such as direct messaging and collaboration discussions, are encrypted and secure to protect the privacy and confidentiality of user conversations.

Title: Protection against Malicious Content
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should implement content moderation mechanisms to detect and prevent the sharing of malicious or harmful content, such as malware, viruses, or inappropriate material.

Title: Scalable User Connection Handling
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The system should be able to handle a growing number of users connecting and interacting with each other for collaboration without experiencing performance degradation or downtime.

Title: Efficient Search and Discovery
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: As the number of users and content on the platform increases, the system should ensure quick and efficient search and discovery of collaborators, allowing users to easily find and connect with relevant musicians and influencers.

Title: Horizontal Scalability for Increased User Base
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The system should be designed to scale horizontally, allowing for the addition of more servers or instances to handle an increasing number of users and their collaboration activities.

Title: Optimized Media Storage and Streaming
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform may involve the storage and streaming of media content, such as music tracks and videos. The system should ensure scalable and efficient storage and streaming capabilities to handle a growing library of content and provide a seamless user experience.

Title: Scalable Data Storage and Retrieval
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: As the platform accumulates user profiles, collaboration history, and sponsorship deals, the system should be able to efficiently store and retrieve large amounts of data, ensuring quick access to relevant information for users and brands.

Title: Compliance with Intellectual Property Rights
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should ensure that all content shared and used for collaboration adheres to intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademark laws.

Title: Data Privacy and Consent
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should comply with data privacy regulations, ensuring that user data is collected, stored, and processed with proper consent and in accordance with applicable laws.

Title: Secure Payment Processing
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: If the platform facilitates financial transactions, it should comply with payment industry standards and regulations, ensuring secure payment processing and protecting user financial information.

Title: Transparency in Sponsorship Deals
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: The platform should provide transparent reporting on sponsorship deals, including details of financial arrangements, to maintain trust and comply with advertising and sponsorship regulations.

Title: Age Verification and COPPA Compliance
Collaborator Discovery and Connection: If the platform allows users under the age of 13, it should comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and implement age verification mechanisms to protect the privacy of young users.
